0871A46B.Toast: Retrieve a fabled weapon from the Rimescar Cavern.

30DC76D6.Phase10Description: I have obtained the storied Grizzly's Maul. I should return it to Greganoch of the Bear Tribe.

398557AF.Callback9Header: Return the Grizzly's Maul to Greganoch

9F90DE2D.Callback7Header: Enter the Rimescar Cavern and acquire the {ITEM}.

C9FCD1EA.Phase5Description: Greganoch of the Bear Tribe has asked that I reclaim the Grizzly's Maul. The tribe's champion who wielded the weapon was taken to the Rimescar Cavern.
